data.actual_result: The Filter By: screen stays open on the server list
data.expected_result: The Filter By: screen should close because Search is closed
data.short_description: Going into Search (bottom right of server list) and pressing the filter and back button within a second of each other causes Filter by: to appear on server list (must be fast) (takes SEVERAL tries)
data.steps_to_repro: - Press Search (magnifying glass in bottom right of server list - Press the three lines in top right and immediately press the back arrow in top left - Observe
